text: Sir Run Run Shaw CBE, GBM (19 November 1907 - 7 January 2014) was an important name in Hong Kong cinema. He made many films with his brother Runme Shaw. Later in life, he donated a lot of money to charity, schools, and hospitals. He died at his residence on the morning of 7 January 2014 at 6:55am (HKT) at the age of 106 from natural causes, peacefully with his family by his side. ==References== == Other websites == * * TVB (Television Broadcasts Limited) * Shaw Studios * Shaw Prize * Shaw Tower at Cathedral Place (Vancouver, Canada) * Life of Shaw brothers * Celestial Pictures Limited * My Life's Pleasure Category:1907 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Asian entertainers Category:Chinese centenarians Category:Chinese philanthropists Category:People from Zhejiang Category:Hong Kong filmmakers Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people
title: Run Run Shaw
